type.name: org.gradle.api.artifacts.repositories.RepositoryLayout
type.description: * Represents the directory structure for a repository. * For examples see the reference for {@link org.gradle.api.artifacts.repositories.IvyArtifactRepository#layout(String, org.gradle.api.Action)} * * @since 2.3 (feature was already present in Groovy DSL, this type introduced in 2.3)
